Name: Mjenir
Traits: Spellcasting. Mjenir is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following druid spells prepared:Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, produce flame, shillelagh1st level (4 slots): entangle, longstrider, speak with animals, thunderwave2nd level (3 slots): animal messenger, barkskin
Actions: Quarterstaff. Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.
